text: <Nu> Ic wille, cwæð Orosius, on foreweardre þisse seofeþan bec gereccean þæt hit þeh Godes bebod wæs, þeh hit strong wære, hu emnlice þa feower onwealdas þara feower heafedrica þisses middangeardes gestodon.
Þæt æreste wæs on Asirium, on þæm eastemestan onwalde, on Babylonia þære byrig.
Sio gestod tuwa seofon hund wintra on hiere onwealde ær hio gefeolle, from Ninuse hiora ærestan cyninge, oþ Sardanopolim heora nihstan: þæt is III C wintra & I M.
Þa Cirus benom Babylonia hiere onwealde, þa ongon ærest Romana weaxan.
Eac on þæm dagum wæs þæt norþmeste micliende on Mæcedonium.
Þæt gestod lytle leng þonne seofon hund wintra from heora ærestan cyninge Canone oþ Perseus heora æftemæstan.
Swa eac on Affricum, on þæm suðmestan, Cartaina sio burg hio gefeoll eac ymb seofon hund wintra & ymb lytelne first þæs þe hie ærest Diþa þe wifmon getimbrede, oþ hi eft Scipia towearp se consul.
Swa eac Romana, se is mæst & westmest.
Ymb VII C wintra & ymb lytelne eacon, com micel <fyrcyn> <&> <micel> <bryne> on Romeburg, þæt þærbinnan forburnon XV tunas, swa nan mon nyste hwonan þæt fyr com.
& þær forwearð mæst eall þæt þærbinnan wæs, þæt þær uneaþe ænig grot staþoles aðstod.

Mid þæm bryne hio wæs swa swiþe forhiened þæt hio næfre siþþan swelc næs, ær hie eft Agustus swa micle bet getimbrede þonne hio æfre ær wære, þy geare þe Crist geboren wæs, swa þætte sume men cwædon þæt hio wære mid gimstanum gefrætwed.
Þone fultum & þæt weorc Agustus gebohte mid fela M talentana.
Hit wæs eac sweotole gesiene þæt hit wæs Godes stihtung ymb þara rica anwaldas, þa þa Abrahame wæs gehaten Cristes cyme on þæm twæm & on feowerteoþan wintra þæs þe Ninus ricsade on Babylonia.

Swa eac eft on þæm siþmestan onwalde & on þæm westemestan, þæt is Roma, wearð se ilca geboren þe ær Abrahame gehaten wæs, on þæm twæm & on feowerteogþan geare þæs þe Agustus ricsade, þæt wæs siþþan Romeburg getimbred wæs VII C wintra & LII.

Siþþan gestod Romeburg XII winter mid miclum welum, þa hwile <þe> Agustus þa eaðmetto wiþ God geheold þe he angunnen hæfde, þæt wæs þæt he fleah & forbead þæt hiene mon god hete, swa nan cyning nolde þe ær him wæs, ac woldon þæt mon to him gebæde & him ofrede.
Ac þæs on þæm twelftan geare Gaius his nefa for of Egyptum on Siriæ, hit hæfde Agustus him to onwalde geseald, þa nolde he him gebiddan to þæm ælmihtigum Gode, þa he to Hierusalem com.
Þa hit mon Agustuse sæde, þa herede he þa ofermetto, & nanuht ne leahtrade.
Raþe þæs Romane anguldon þæs wordes mid swa miclum hungre þæt Agustus adraf of Romebyrig healfe þe þærbinnan wæron.
Þa wearð eft Ianes duru andon, for þon þe þa latteowas wæron Agustuse of monegum landum ungerade, þeh þær nan gefeoht þurhtogen ne wurde.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII hunde wintra & LXVII, feng Tiberius to rice se cesar æfter Agustuse.
He wæs Romanum swa forgiefen & swa milde swa him nan <onwalda> næs ær þæm, oþ him Pilatus onbead from Hierusalem ymbe Cristes tacnunga, & ymbe his martyrunga, & eac þæt hiene monige for god hæfde.

Ac þa he hit sæde þæm senatum, þa wurdon hie alle wið hiene <swiðe> wiðerwearde, for þon þe hit mon ne sæde him æror swa hit mid him gewuna wæs, þæt hie hit siþþan mehten eallum Romanum cyþan, & cwædon þæt hie hiene for god habban noldon.

Þa wearð Tiberius Romanum swa wrað & swa heard swa he him ær wæs milde & ieþe, þæt he forneah nanne þara senatusa ne let cucne, ne þara twa & twentigra monna þe he him to fultume hæfde acoren, þæt his rædþeahteras wæren, þa mon het patricius; ealle þa he het ofslean buton twam, ge his agene twegen suna.
Hu God þa þa mæstan ofermetto gewræc on þæm folce, & hu swiðe hi his anguldon from heora agnum casere.
Þeh hit eallum þæm folcum of oþrum londum swa swiþe gewrecen ne wurde swa hit oft ær wæs.
On þæm twelftan geare Tiberiuses rices wearþ eft Godes wracu Romanum, þa hie æt hiora theatrum wæron mid heora plegan, þa hit eall tofeoll, & heora ofslog XX M.
Wyrþigre wrace hie forwurdon ða, cwæð Orosius, þæt þa heora synna sceoldon hreowsian & dædbote don swiþor þonne heora plegan <began>, swa hiora gewuna wæs ær þæm cristendome.

On þæm eahtateoþan geare his rices, þa Crist wæs ahangen, wearð micel þeosternes ofer eallne middangeard, & swa micel eorðbeofung þæt cludas feollon of muntum, &, þætte þara wundra mæst wæs, þa se mona ful wæs, & þære sunnan firrest, þæt hio þa aþeostrade.
Æfter þæm Romane acwealdon Tiberius mid attre.
He hæfde rice XXIII wintra.
Æfter ðæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII hunde wintra & LXXXX, wearþ Gaius Gallica casere IIII gear.
He wæs swiþe gefylled mid unþeawum & mid firenlustum, & ealle he wæs swelce Romane þa wyrþe wæron, for þon þe hie Cristes bebod hyspton, & hit forsawon.

Ac he hit on him swiþe wræc, & hi him swa laðe wæron þæt he oft wyscte þæt ealle Romane hæfden ænne sweoran, þæt he hiene raþost forceorfan mehte; & mid ungemete mænde þæt þær þa næs swelc sacu swelc þær oft ær wæs.
& he self for oft on oþra lond, & wolde gewin findan, ac he ne mehte buton sibbe.
Ungelice wæron þa tida, cwæð Orosius, siþþan Crist geboren wæs, siþþan mon ne mehte unsibbe findan, & ær þæm hie mon ne mehte mid nanum þingan forbugan.
On þæm dagum com eac Godes wracu ofer Iuþan, þæt hie ægþer hæfdon ungeþwærnesse ge betweonum him selfum ge to eallum folcum; swa þeh hio wæs swiþost on Alexandria þære byrig.
& hie Gaius het ut adrifan.
Þa sendon hie Filonem hiora þone gelæredestan mon to þon þæt he him sceolde Gaiuses mildse geærendian.

Ac he hie for þære gewilnunga swiþe bismrade, & bebead þæt hie mon on ælce healfe hiende þær mon þænne mehte, & bebead þæt mon afielde diofolgielda þa cirican æt Hierusalem, & þæt mon his agen deofolgield þærtomiddes asette, þæt wæs his <agen> onlicnes.
& Pilatus he hæfde on þreatunge oþ he hiene selfne ofstong: he gedæmde urne Dryhten to deaðe.
Raþe þæs Romane ofslogon Gaius slæpendne.
Þa funde mon on his maðmhuse twa cista, þa wæron attres fulle.
& on oþerre wæs an gewrit, þær wæron on awritene ealra þara ricestena monna noman þe he acwellan þohte, <þæt> <he> <hi> <þe> <læs> <forgeate>.
Þa geat mon þæt attor ut on þone sæ, raþe þæs þær com upp micel wæl deadra fisca.
Ægþær wæs swiðe gesiene, ge Godes wracu, þa he þæt folc costigan let, ge eft his mildsung, þa he hie fordon ne let, swa hit Gaius geþoht hæfde.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII hunde wintra & XCI, þa feng Tiberius Claudius to Romana onwalde.
On þæm ærestan geare his rices Petrus se apostol com to Rome, & þær wurdon ærest cristene men þurh his lare.
Þa woldon Romane ofslean Claudius for Gaiuses þingum his mæges, þæs ærran cesares, & ealle þa þe þære mægþe wæron.
Ac mid þon þe hie þæs cristendomes onfengon, hie wæron swa geþwære & swa gesibsume þæt hie ealle forgeafon þæm casere þa fæhþe þe his mæg hæfde wið hie ær geworht.
Ond he forgeaf him eallum þæt unryht & þæt facn þæt <hie> him don þohte.
On þære tide gewearð eac oþer tacen on Romana onwalde, siþþan him se cristendom to com.
Þæt wæs þæt Dalmatie woldon gesellan Scribanianuse þæm latteowe hiora cynerice, & siþþan wið Romane winnan.
Ac þa hie gesomnod wæron, & hiene to cyninge don woldon, þa ne mehton hie þa guðfonan upahebban, swa hiora þeaw wæs, þonne hie onwaldas setton.
Ac wurdon him selfum wiðerwearde þæt hie hit æfre ongunnon, & <Scribanianus> ofslogon.
Oðsace nu, cwæð Orosius, se, se þe wille oþþe se þe dyrre, þæt þæt angin nære gestilled for þæs cristendomes Gode, & gesecge hwær ænig gewin ær þæm cristendome swa gehwurfe, gif hit ongunnen wære.
Oþer wundor gewearð eac þy feorþan geare Claudiuses rices, þæt he self æfter gewinne for, & nan findan ne mehte.
On þæm geare wæs micel hungor on Siria & on Palestina, buton þæt Elena, ætiubena cwen, sealde þæm munucum corn genog þe wæron <æt> Hierusalem, for þon þe hio þa wæs niwlice cristen.
On þæm fiftan geare Claudiuses rices wearð oþiewed an igland betuh Theram & Therasiam, V mila brad & V mila long.

On þæm seofeþan geare his rices wearð swa micel ungeþwærnes on Hierusalem betuh þæm þe þær cristene wæron, þæt þær wæron XXX M ofslagen, & æt þæm geate oftredd, swa nan mon nyste hwonon sio <wroht> com.
On þæm nigeþan geare his rices wearð micel hunger on Rome, & <Claudius> het ut adrifan ealle þa Iudan þe þærbinnan wæron.
Æfter þæm Romane witan Claudiuse þone hunger þe him getenge wæs, & he wearð him swa grom, þæt he het ofslean þara senatorum XXXV, & þara oþerra III hund þe þær ieldeste wæron.
Æfter þæm Romane hiene acwealdon mid atre.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII hunde wintra & IX, feng Nero to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XIIII gear.
He hæfde giet þe ma unþeawa <þonne> his eam hæfde ær Gaius.

Toeacan þæm monigfealdum bismrum þe he donde wæs, he het æt sumum cierre onbærnan Romeburg, & bebead his agnum monnum þæt hie simle gegripen þæs licgendan feos swa hie mæst mehten, & to him brohten, þonne hit mon ut oþbrude & gestod him self on þæm hiehstan torre þe þærbinnan wæs, & ongon wyrcan scopleoð be þæm bryne.
Se wæs VI dagas biernende & VII niht.
Ac he wræc his ungewealdes ærest on þære byrig hiora misdæda, & siþþan on him selfum, þa he hiene ofstong, þæt hie Petrus & Paulus gemartredon.
He wæs monna ærest ehtend cristenra monna.
Æfter his fielle wearð þara casera mægð offeallen.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII hunde wintra & XXIIII, feng Galua se casere to Romana onwalde.
Þæs on þæm seofeþan monðe hiene ofslog Othon an mon, & him to þon anwalde feng.
Sona swa Romane ærest cristenra monna ehton, swa hit Nero onstealde, swa wurdon ealle þa folc hiora wiðerwinnan þe be eastan Siria wæron, ge eac hie selfe him betweonum hæfdon ungerædnesse.
Uitellus, Germania cyning, gefeaht þriwa wið Othon, & hiene ofslog on þæm þriddan monðe þæs þe hie winnan ongunnon.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC wintra & XXV, feng Uespasianus to Romana onwalde.
Þa wearð eft sibb ofer ealne Romana anwald, & he bebead Tituse his suna þæt he towearp þæt templ on Hierusalem, & ealle þa burg, for þon þe God nolde þæt hie þone cristendom mierde leng.
& forbead þæt mon na ðær eft ne timbrede.
& he fordyde þara Iudena XI hund M: sume he ofslog, sume on oþer land gesealde, sume he mid hungre acwealde.
Æfter þæm mon dyde him twæm þone triumphan, Uespasiane & Tituse.
Seo onsien wearð þa micel wundor Romanum, for þon hi ær ne gesawon II men atsæmne ðæron sittan.
Hi betyndan Ianes dura.
Æfter þæm <Wespasianus> gefor on utsihte, on ðæm <nigeþan> geare his rices, on anum tune buton Rome.
<Æfter> þæm ðe Romeburh getimbred wæs VIII hunde wintra & XXIX, feng Titus to Romana onwalde, & hine hæfde II gear.
He wæs swa godes willan þæt he sægde þæt he forlure þone dæg þe he noht on to gode ne gedyde.
He gefor eac on þæm ilcan tune ðe his fæder dyde, & on þære ilcan adle.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII hunde wintra & XXX, feng Domitianus to Romana onwalde, Tituses broþor, & hit hæfde XV gear.
He wearþ eft <ehtend> cristenra monna, & wæs on swa micle ofermetto astigen, þæt he bead þæt man on gelice to him onbugan sceolde swa to Gode.
And he bebead þæt mon Iohannes þone apostol gebrohte on Bothmose þæm iglande, on wræcsiþe from oþrum cristenum monnum.
& he bebead þæt mon acwealde eall Dauides cynn, to þon, gif Crist geboren nære þa giet, þæt he na siþþan geboren ne wurde; for þon þe witgan sædon þæt he of þæm cynne cuman sceolde.
Æfter þæm bebode he wearð self unweorðlice ofslagen.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII hund wintra & XLVI, þa feng Nerfa to Romana onwalde; & for þon þe <he> eald wæs, he geceas him to fultume Traianus þone mon.

Þa gespræcon hie him betweonum þæt hie wolden anwendan ealle þa gesetnessa & ealle þa gebodu þe Domitianus hæfde ær gesett, for þon þe he him wæs ær bæm lað; & heton eft Iohannes æt his mynstre gebrengan on Effesum from þæm <woruldierþum> þe he <hwile> on wæs.
Þa gefor Nerfa, & Traianus hæfde þone anwald <XIX> ger æfter him.
& he underþiedde Romanum eall þa folc þe him niwlice geswicen hæfdon.
& he bebead his <aldormonnum> þæt hie wæren cristenra monna ehtend.
Þa sæde him hiora an, Plenius wæs haten, þæt he woh bude, & miclum on þæm syngade.
He hit þa hrædlice eft forbead.
On þære tide wæron Iudan on miclum geflite & on micelre unsibbe wið þa londleode þær þær hie þonne wæron, oþ hiora fela M forwurdon on ægþere hand.
On þære tide Traianus gefor on utsihte on Seleutia þære byrig.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC wintra & <LXVII>, feng Adrianus to Romana onwalde, <Traianuses> nefa, & hiene hæfde XXI wintra.

& raðe þæs þe him cristne bec cuþe wæron þurh ænne þara apostola geongrena, Quadratus wæs haten, he forbead ofer ealne his onwald þæt mon nanum cristenum men ne abulge; & gif ænig cristen agylte, þæt se þonne wære beforan him gelædd, & he him þonne demde self, swa him ryht þuhte.
He wearð þa Romanum swa leof, & swa weorð þæt hie hiene nanuht ne heton buton fæder, & him to weorðscipe hie heton his wif casern.
& he het ofslean ealle þa Iudiscan men, for þon þe hie cristene men pinedon; þa wæron on Palestina, þæt mon het Iudena lond.
& he bebead þæt mon timbrede on oþerre stowe Hierusalem þa burg, & þæt hie mon siþþan hete be noman <Heliam>.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC wintra & LXXXVIII, feng Ponpeius to Romana onwalde, þe mon oþre nomon het Pius.
& him sealde Iustinus se philosophus ane cristene boc for hiora freondscipe.
Siþþan he þa geleornod hæfde, he wearð cristnum monnum <swa> <leof> <&> swiþe hold oþ his lifes ende.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & III, feng Marcus Antonius to Romana onwalde mid his breðer Aureliuse.
Hie wæron þa ærestan men þe Romana onwald on tu todældon; & hiene hæfden XIIII winter.
& hie bebudon þæt mon ælcne cristenne mon ofsloge.
Æfter þæm hie hæfdon micel gewin wið Parthe, for þon þe hie hæfdon awest ealle Capodotiam & Armeniam, & ealle Siriam.
Æfter þæm hie genamon frið <wið> Parthe.
& him siþþan becom on <swa> micel hungor & micel moncwealm, þæt heora feawa to lafe wurdon.
Æfter þæm him becom on þæt Deniscæ gewinn mid eallum Germanium.
Þa on þæm dæge þe hie gefeohtan sceoldon, him com on swa micel hæte & swa micel þurst þæt hie him heora feores ne wendan.
Þa bædon hie þa cristnan men þæt hi heora an sume wisan gehulpen; & ongeaton þæt hit wæs Godes wracu.
Þa abædon hie æt þæm ælmihtegum Gode þæt hit swa swiðe rinde þæt hie hæfdon wæter genog onufan þære dune, & þæt þær wæs swa micel þunor þæt he ofslog fela þusend monna gemong þæm gefeohte.
Þa æfter þæm ealle Romane wurdon cristnum monnum swa holde þæt hie on monegum templum awriten þæt ælc cristen mon hæfde frið & sibbe, & eac þæt ælc þara moste cristendome onfon se þe wolde.
& Antonius forgef eall þæt gafol þæt mon to Rome sellan sceolde, & het forbærnan þæt gewrit þe hit on awriten wæs, hwæt mon on geare agiefan sceolde.
& þæs on þæm æfterran geare he gefor.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC <wintra> & XXX, feng Lucius Antonius to rice, & hit hæfde XIII ger.
He wæs swiþe yfel monn ealra þeawa, buton þæt he wæs cene, & oft feaht anwig.
& fela þara senatorum he het ofslean þe þær betste wæron.
Æfter an þunor toslog hiora Capitoliam, þæt hus þe hiora godas inne wæron & hiora diofolgield; & hiora bibliotheoco wearð onbærned from ligette, & ealle heora ealdan bec forburnon þærinne.
Þær wæs a swa micel dem geburnen swa on Alexandria wæs þære byrig on hiora <bibliotheoco>, þær forburnon IIII hund M boca.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg wæs getimbred DCCCC wintra & XLIII, feng Seuerus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XVII ger.
He besæt <Piscenius> on anum fæstenne, oþ he him on hond eode; & he hiene siþþan het ofslean, for þon he wolde ricsian on Sirie & on Egypte.
Æfter þæm <he> ofslog Albinus þone mon on Gallium, for þon þe he eac wolde on hine winnan.
Siþþan he for on Brettanie, & þær oft gefeaht wið Peohtas & wið Scottas, ær he þa Brettas mehte wið hie bewerian.
& het ænne weall þwyres ofer eall þæt lond asettan from sæ oþ sæ, & raþe þæs he gefor on Eforwicceastre.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & LXII, feng his sunu to rice Antonius, & hit hæfde VII ger.
He hæfde twa geswostor him to wifum.
He hæfde folc gegaderad, & wolde winnan on Parthe, ac he wearð ofslagen on þæm færelte from his agnum monnum.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & LXX, feng Marcus Aurelius to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde IIII ger.
Hiene ofslogon eac his agene men, & his modor mid.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & LXXIIII, feng Aurelianus Alexander to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XVI gear.
& Mammea his sio gode modor sende æfter Origenise þæm gelæredestan mæssepreoste, & hio wearð siþþan cristen from him & welgelæred, & gedyde þæt hiere sunu wæs cristenum monnum swiþe hold.
He gefor mid fierde on Perse, & ofslog Xersan hiora cyning.
Æfter þæm he forlet his lif on Magentsan þære byrig.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & LXXXVII, feng Maximus to Romana onwalde.
He bebead eft þæt mon cristene men brocode, & þæt mon þa godan Mammeam gemartrade, & ealle þa Preostas þe hiere folgodan, buton Origenis: <he> oþfleah on Aegypte.
& Maximus ofslog his agen ealdormon on þæm þriddan geare his rices on Aquilegia þære byrig.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & XC feng Gordianus to rice, & hit hæfde VI ger.
& he ofslog þa twegen gebroðor þe ær Maximus ofslogan.
& he self raþe þæs gefor.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC wintra & XCVII, feng Philippus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde VII ger.
He wearð diegellice cristen, for þon he eawenga ne dorste.

On þæm þriddan geare his rices hit gewearð swa hit God gestihtade, þæt wæs ymb an M wintra þæs þe Romeburg getimbred wæs, þæt ægþer ge hiora casere wearð cristen, ge eac þæt hie þa miclan feorme þigedon Cristes þonces æt þæs caseres palendsan, þe hie ær ælce geare þigedon at hiora deofolgildum, deofla þonces: þæt wæs þæt ealle Romane woldon ymb XII monað bringan togædere þone selestan dæl hiora goda <gegearod> <to> <heora> <geblote> & hiora siþþan fela wucena ætgædere brucan.
Æfter þæm Decius, an rice mon, beswac þone casere, & feng him <siþþan> to þon anwalde.
Æfter <þæm> þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & IIII, feng Decius to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde III ger.

& sona gedyde sweotol tacn þæt he Philippus ær besierede, mid þæm þe he het cristenra monna ehtan & monege gedyde to halgum martyrum, & gesette his sunu to þæm onwalde to him, and <raðe> þæs hie wurdon begen ætsemne ofslagen.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & VIII, feng Gallus Ostilianus to rice, & hit hæfde II ger.

Þa wearð eft Godes wracu on Rome: swa longe swa seo ehtnes wæs þara cristenra monna, swa longe him wæs ungemetlic moncwealm getenge, þæt nan hus næs binnan þære <byrig> þæt hit næfde þære wrace angolden.
Æfter þæm Emilianus ofslog Gallus, & hæfde him þone anweald.
Þæs eac on þæm þriddan monðe hiene mon ofslog.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & X, þa gesetton Romane II caseras.
Oþer wæs binnan Romebyrig, Gallienus wæs haten, oþer wæs mid Emilitum þæm folce, Ualerianus wæs haten.
Þa sceoldon on siml beon winnende þær hit þonne þearf wæs.
Þa bebudon hie begen cristenra monna ehtnesse.
Ac hrædlice on hie begen com Godes wracu.
Ualerianus for mid fierde ongean Sapan, Persa cyning, & þær gefongen wæs.
& siþþan he wæs Sapan þæm cyninge to ðon geset, oþ his lifes ende, þæt he swa oft sceolde stupian swa he to his horse wolde, & he þonne se cyning hæfde his <hricg> him to hliepan.
& þæm oþrum, Gallienuse, wæron monog folc onwinnende, þæt he his rice mid micellre unweorðnesse & mid micelre unieðnesse gehæfde.

Ærest Germanie þe be Donua wæron, forhergedon Italiam oþ rafennan þa burg; & Swæfas forhergedon ealle Galliam; & Gotan oferhergedon eall Creca lond, & þa læssan Asiam; & Sermende genieddon ealle Dati from Romana onwalde; & Hunas forhergedon Pannoniam; & Parthe forhergedon Mesopotamiam, & ealle Sirie.
Toeacan þæm Romane hæfdon gewin betuh him selfum.
Æfter þæm Gallienus wearð ofslagen on Medialane þære byrig from his agnum monnum.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XXV, feng Claudius to Romana onwalde.
Þy ilcan geare he oferwon Gotan, & hie adraf ut of Crecum.
& him Romane gedydan ænne gyldenne scield, þære dæda to weorðmynte, & <ane> gyldene anlicnesse, & ahengon <hie> up on hiora Capitoliam.
Þæs on þæm æfterran geare he gefor, & his broþor Quintillus feng to þæm onwalde.
& þæs on þæm seofonteoþan dæge he wearð ofslagen.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XXVII, feng Aurelius to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde V ger & VI monað.
& adraf Gotan be norþan Donua, & þonan for on Sirie, & hie geniedde eft to Romana onwalde.
& siþþan he for on Gallie, & ofslog Tetricum þone mon, for þy þe he hi him teah to anwalde.
Æfter þæm he bebead cristenra monna ehtnesse, & raðe þæs wearþ ofslagen.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XXXII, feng Tacitus to Romana onwalde, & þæs on þæm sixtan monþe he wearþ ofslagen on Ponto þæm londe.
Æfter þæm Floriam feng to þæm onwalde, & wæs ofslagen <þæs> on þæm þriddan monþe on Thærsa þæm londe.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg wæs getimbred M wintra & XXXIII, feng Brobus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde VI ger & IIII monað.
& he adyde <Hunas> of Gallium.
& he ofslog Saturninus, þe æfter þæm onwalde wonn.
Æfter þæm he ofslog Proculus & <Bonorum>; þa gierndon eac æfter þæm onwalde.
Æfter þæm he wearð self ofslagen on Sirmie þære dune.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XXXIX, feng Carus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde II ger.
& gefeaht tuwwa wið Parthe, & geeode hiora burga twa; þa wæron on Tigris staþe þære ie.
Raþe þæs hiene ofslog an þunor.
& his sunu Numerianus feng to þæm onwalde.
& raþe þæs hiene ofslog his agen sweor.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XLI, feng Dioclitianus to Romano onwalde, & hiene hæfde XX wintra.
He gesette under him gingran casere, Maximus wæs haten, & hiene sende on Gallie, for þon ðe hie þa niwlice hæfdon gewinn up ahæfen, ac he hie þa ieðelice ofercom.
On þære tide wæron Dioclitie III cyningas on winnende: Caucarius on Bretlande, & Achileus of Egypta londe, & Marseus of Persum.
Þa gesette he III caseras under him: an wæs Maximianus, oþer Constantius, þridda Galerius.
Maximianus he sende on Affricam, & he oferwonn hiora wiþerwinnan.
& Constantius he sende on Gallie, & he oferwonn Alamanni þæt folc, & siþþan he geeode Brettaniam þæt igland.
& he self Dioclitianus for on ægypte, & besæt Achileus þone cyning eahta monað on Alexandria þære byrig, oð hiene þa burgleode him ageafon, & he siþþan oferhergeade ealle Egypte.
& Galerius he sende on Perse, & gefeaht II wið Marseus þone cyning, þæt hiera naþer næfde sige.
Æt heora þriddan gefeohte Galerius wearþ gefliemed, & mid micelre fyrhtnesse com to Dioclitiane.
Ac he his onfeng mid micelre unweorðnesse, & hiene het iernan on his <agenum> purpurum fela mila beforan his rædwæne.
Æfter þæm þe his mod wæs mid þæm bismre ahwet, he for eft on Perse, & hie gefliemde, & Marseus gefeng, & his wif, & his bearn.
Þa onfeng Dioclitianus Galerius weorðlice.
Æfter þæm Dioclitianus & Maximianus bebudon ehtnesse cristenra monna, Dioclitianus eastane, & Maximianus westane.
& for þon gebode gewurdon fela martyra on X wintra firste.
Þa gewearð hi him betweonum þæt hie woldon þa onwaldas forlætan, & þa purpuran alecgan þa hie weredon, & woldon hiera dagas on seftnesse geendian.
& þæt swa gelæston.
Dioclitianus gesæt on Nicomidio þære byrig, <&> <Maximianus> <gesæt> <on> <Mediolane> <þære> <byrig>.
& leton þa onwealdas to Galeriuse & to Constantiuse.

& hi hiene todældon siþþan on tu: Galerius nom Ilirice, & begeondan þæm þone eastende, & þone mæstan dæl þisses middangeardes; & Constantius nom ealle Italie, & Affricam, & Ispanie, & Gallie, & Brettanie.
Ac he wæs hwon giernende þissa woroldþinga & micelra onwalda, & for þæm he forlet his agnum willan Italiam & Affricam to Galeriuse.
Þa gesette Galerius II cyningas under him: oþer wæs haten Seuerus, þæm he gesealde Italiam & Africam, & Maximianus he gesette on þa eastlond.
On þæm dagum Constantius, se mildesta monn, for on Brettannie, & þær gefor.
& gesealde his suna þæt rice <Constantinuse>, þone he hæfde be Elenan his ciefese.
Þa wolde Maxentius, Maximianuses sunu, habban þone anwald on Italiam.
Þa sende Galerius him ongean Seuerus mid fierde, þe him se onweald ær geseald wæs, & he þær beswicen wearð from his agnum monnum, & ofslagen, neah <Rafenne> þære byrig.
Þa Maximianus geacsade þæt his sunu feng to þæm onwalde, he þa hrædlice forlet þa burg þe he on geseten wæs, & þohte his sunu to beswicanne, & him siþþan fon to þæm onwalde.
Ac þa hit se sunu anfunde, þa adræfde he þone fæder.
& he fleah on Gallie, & wolde <Constantinus> beswican his aþum, & habban him þæt rice.
Ac hit anfunde his dohtor, & hit <Constantinuse> asæde, & he hiene afliemde siþþan on Masiliam; & he þær ofslagen wearð.
Þa gesealde Galerius Lucinuse Italiam & Affricam; & he het ealle þa cristnan þe þær <betste> wæron gebringan on elþeode.
Æfter þæm he wearð on micelre untrumnesse, & him to gehet monigne læce.
& heora nan him ne mehte bion nane gode.
Ac him sæde heora an þæt hit wære Godes wracu.
Þa het he þæt mon þa cristnan eft gebrohte on heora earde, ælcne þær he ær wæs; swa þeah he gefor on þære mettrymnesse, & <Lucinius> feng to þæm onwalde.
Æfter þæm weraþ gewinn betuh Constantinuse & Maxentiuse, & raðe þæs Constantinus ofslog Maxentius binnan Rome, æt þære <brycge> þe mon Moluia het.
On þæm dagum Maximinus bebead cristenra monna ehtnesse, & raðe þæs gefor on Tharsa þære byrig.
On þæm dagum <Lucinius> bebead þæt nan cristen mon ne come on his hierede ne on his færelte.
& raþe þæs wearð gewin betuh him & betuh Constantinuse & oftrædlica gefeoht, oþ Constantinus gefeng Lucinius, & hiene siþþan het beheafdian, & siþþan feng to eallum Romana onwalde.
On þæm dægum Arrius se mæssepresbyter wearþ on gedwolan ymb þone ryhtan geleafan.
Ymb þone timan wæs gegaderad III hund biscepa & eahtatiene, hiene to oferflitanne & to <amansumianne>.
On þæm dagum Constantinus ofslog Crispum his sunu, & Lucinius his swostor sunu, þæt nan monn nyste hwæt se gylt wæs, buton him anum.
Æfter þæm he underþiedde him selfum monege þeoda þe ær wæron Romanum ungewilde.
& het atimbran ane burg on Crecum, & het hie be him hatan <Constantinopolim>.
He bebead ærest monna þæt mon cirican timbrede, & þæt mon beluce ælc <diofolgieldhus>.
He gefor ymb XXXI wintra þæs þe he rice hæfde, on anum tune neah Nicomedio þære byrig.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg <getimbred> wæs M wintra & XCI, feng Constantius to þæm onwalde mid his II broþrum, Constantine & Constante.
& he Constantius hit hæfde XXIIII wintra.
Hie wurdon ealle þa gebroþor on þæm <Arianiscan> gedwolan.
Constantinus & Constans wunnon him betweonum, oþ <Constantinus> wearð ofslagen.
Æfter þæm Magnentius ofslog Constans, & feng him to þæm rice, þæt wæs Galliam & Italiam.
On þæm dagum Ilirice gesetton Ueteromonem þone mon to hiora anwealde, to þon þæt hie siþþan mehten winnan wið Magnentiuse; & hi hiene nieddon to leornunga, þeh he gewintred wære.
Ac Constantinus hiene benæmde ægþer ge þæs onwaldes, ge þære purpuran þe he werede, ge þære scole þe he on leornode.
Æfter he gefeaht wið Magnentiuse, & hiene gefliemde, & bedraf into Luchina þære byrig; & he hiene selfne siþþan ofsticode.

Æfter þæm <Constantius> gesette Iulianus to casere under him, se wæs ær þæm to diacone gehalgod, & sende hiene on Gallie mid firde; & he hrædlice oferwon ealle þe þa on Gallie wunnon; & wæs æfter þære dædæ swa up ahæfen þæt he wolde ealne Romana onwald him geagnian, & mid firde wæs farende þær <Constantius> wæs mid oþerre fierde wiþ Parhte.
Þa he þæt geacsade & him ongeanweard wæs, þa he gefor on þæm færelte.
& Iulianus feng to þæm onwalde, & hiene hæfde an gear & eahta monað.

Þa wæs he sona geornfull þæt he wolde diegellice þone cristendom onwendan & forbead openlice þæt mon nane fæste boc ne leornode, & sæde eac þæt nan cristen mon ne moste habban nænne his sunderfolgeþa, & hie mid þæm þohte beswican.
Ac ealle hie wæron þæs wordes, swa we hit <eft> secgan hierdon, cwæð Orosius, þæt him leofre wæs se cristendom to beganne þonne his scira to habbanne.

Æfter þæm he gegaderade fierd, & wolde faran on Perse, & bebead, þonne he eft wære eastane hamweard, þæt mon hæfde anfiteatrum geworht æt Hierusalem, þæt he mehte Godes þeowas on don, þæt hie dior þærinne abite.

Ac god gewræc on þæm færelte swiþe gedafenlice on þæm arleasan men his arlease geþoht, mid þæm þæt hiene gemette an mon, þa he for from Actesifonte þære byrig, gelicost þæm þe he fliema wære, & him sæde þæt he hiene mehte lædan þurh þæt westen, þæt he on Perse on ungearwe become.

Ac þa he hiene tomiddes þæs westennes hæfde gelædd, þa geswac he him þæt nan mon nyste þæs færeltes hwær he com, ac foran hwærfigiende geond þæt westen, þæt he nyste hwær he ut sceolde, oþ þæs folces wæs fela forworden, ægþer ge for þurste ge for hæte.
Þa com him ongean an uncuð mon, & ofstong Iulianus.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & I hund & XVII, feng Iuuinianus to Romana onwalde.
Hiene mon geceas on þæm westenne, þy ilcan dæge þe mon Iulianus ofstong.
He gesealde Persum Nissibi þa burg, & healfe Mesopotamiam þæt lond, wiþ þæm þe hie of þæm londe mosten buton laþe.
On þæm eahtoþan monþe þæs þe he to þæm onwalde feng, he wolde faran on Ilirice.
Þa wæs he sume niht on anum nicealtan huse.
Þa het he betan þærinne micel fyr, for þon hit wæs ceald weder.
Þa ongon se cealc mid ungemete stincan; þa wearþ <Iuninianus> mid þæm bræþe ofsmorod.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & XCVIII, feng Ualentinianus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde endlefan gear.
He wæs ær þæm Iulianuses cempena ealdormon.
He him bebead þæt he forlete þone his cristendom oððe his folgað.

Þa wæs him leofre þæt he forlete his folgað þonne þone cristendom; ac him <gefylste> God eft to maran are, þa he þa læssan for his lufan forlet, & þæt he þæs ilcan rices ahte geweald þe his wiðerwinna ær ahte.
Raðe þæs he gesealde Ualente his breðer healf his rice.
& he het ofslean Percopiosus, þe þa ricsian wolde, & monege oðre mid him.

Ualens wæs gelæred from anum Arrianiscan biscepe, Eudoxius wæs haten, ac he hit hæl swiðe fæste wið his broðor, for þon he wiste þæt he hit on him wrecan wolde, gif he anfunde þæt he on oþran geleafan wære, on oþran he self wæs, for þon he wiste hu fæstmod he wæs ær on his geleafan, þa he læssan onwald hæfde.
On þæm ilcan geare Godenric, Gotena cyning, gedyde fela martyra on his þeode cristenra monna.
On þæm dagum Ualentinianus geniedde eft þa Seaxan to hiera agnum lande, þa hie woldon winnan on Romane; þa wæron eardfæste neh þæm garsecge.
& Burgendum he gestierde eac þæt hie on Gallie ne wunnon; mid þæm him wæs swiþost gestiered þæt him mon gehet fulwiht.
On þæm enleftan geare his rices Sermende hergedon on Pannoniam; þa he þiderweard wæs mid fierde, þa gefor he on blodryne.

<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & an hund & XXVIIII, feng Ualens, <Ualentinianuses> broþor, to Romana onwalde; & Gratianus, <Ualentinianuses> sunu, feng to Italia anwalde, & to Gallia, & to Ispania, under Ualense.

He þa Ualens oðewde openlice þæt he ær diegellice gehyd hæfde, swa þæt he bebead þæt munecas, þe woroldlica þing forgan sculon, & wæpna gefeoht, þæt hie wæpena namen, & mid þæm fuhte, & yfel dyde mid oþrum monnum.
& sende on Egypte & het toweorpan eal þa munuclif þe his broðor ær gestaþelade; & sume þa munecas he het ofslean, sume on elþiede fordrifan.
On þæm dagum Firmus wæs haten sum mon on Africum, se wæs þær wilniende þæs onwaldes.
Þa sende Ualens þider Theodosius his ealdormon <mid> <fierde>, <þæs> <godan> <þeodosiuses> <fæder>, þe eft wæs casere.
On þæm færelte Firmus wearð gefangen, & forþ gelæded to sleanne.

Þa bæd he self þæt hiene mon ær gefulwade, & þa he gefulwad wæs, he wæs þurh þæs mæssepreostes lare þe hiene fulwade on swa fullum geleafan heofonrices, þæt he cwæð to ðæm folce, Doð nu swa ge willen, & him self leat forþ þæt him mon aslog þæt heafod of, & wearð Cristes martyre.
On ðæm dagum Gratianus gefeaht on Gallium wið Alomonne þæm folce, & heora fela M ofslog.

On þæm ðriddan geare his rices, þa he þæt mæste woh dyde wið þa Godes þeowas, þa adrifon hine Gotan ut of hiora earde, & hie foran siþþan ofer Donua þa ea on Ualenses rice, & wilnedon to him þæt hie mosten on his rice mid friðe gesittan.
Þa <oferhogode> he þæt he him aðer dyde, oþþe wiernde, oþþe tigþade, ac hie let sittan þær þær hie woldon.
Ac his gerefan & his ealdormen nieddon hi æfter gafole, & micel geflit hæfdon ymb þæt, oþ þa Gotan hie mid gefeohte gefliemdon.

Þa Ualens þæt geacsade on Antiochia þære byrig, þa wearð he swiþe sarig, & geþohte his misdæda, hu hi hiene bædon ryhtes geleafan & fulwihtes bæðes, & he him sende Arrianisce biscepas to lareowum & gedwolmen, swa he self wæs, & hwæt he hæfde Godes þeowum on oftsiþas to laðe gedon; het þeh sendon æfter, þær he ænigne libbendne wiste, þeh he þæt to late dyde & him siþþan het gearian.
On þæm feorþan geare his rices he gefeaht wiþ Gotan, & gefliemed wearð, & bedrifen on anne tun, & þær wearð on anum huse forbærned.
Þær wæs swiþe ryht dom geendad þæt hie þone woroldlice forbærndon þe hie þohte bærnan on ecnesse.

<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & C & XXXIII, feng Gratianus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde VI ger; & gesette Theodosius him to fultume, for þon him geþuhte þæt þa þeoda þa hiora wiðerwinnan wæron wæren to swiðe gestrongade þæt hie mon leng ne mehte mid gefeohtum oferswiþan.
Ac Theodosius genam friþ wið hie, & on þære sibbe he lædde Athanaricus hiora cyning mid him to Constantinopolim þære byrig; & þær raðe þæs his lif geendade.
Raðe þæs þe Gotan angeaton hu god Theodosius wæs, ægþer ge hie, ge ealle þa þeoda þe on Sciþþium wæron, gecuron his frið.
On þæm dagum gecuron Brettanie Maximianus him to casere ofer his willan.
Se wære wierðe ealra Romana onwaldes for his monigfealdum duguðum, buton þæt he þa wiþ his hlaford won for oðra monna lare.
& raðe þæs for on Gallie, & Gratianus ofslog, & Ualentinianus his broðor he adraf ut of Italiam, þæt he oðfleah to Theodosiuse.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & C & XXXVIII, feng Theodosius to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XI ger.
He hæfde VI gearum ær onwald ofer þa eastdælas.
He þa Theodosius wæs þencende hu he Gratianus his hlaford gewrecan mehte, & eac his broðor on þæm onwalde gebringan.
& fird gelædde on Italie, þær Maximus mid firde bad æt Aquilegia þære byrig, & his ealdormen Andregatia hæfde beboden þa clusan to healdanne.
Ac se ealdormon hie betæhte lyþrum monnum to healdonne, & <þohte> him self on scipun to farenne east ymbutan, & þonne bestelan on Theodosius hindan.

Ac mid þæm þe he from þære clusan afaren wæs wiþ þara scipa, þa com Theodosius þærto, & funde þæræt feawa men, þa wæron yfele & earge; & he hie <raðe> <aweg> aþewde, & þa clusan tobræc, & siþþan for ofer þa muntas, oþ he com to Aquilegia, & Maximus ofslog.
Þa þæt se ealdormon hierde, þa adrencte he hiene selfne.
Hu ieðelice God geendade þæt micle gewin mid hiora twegea fielle, <þe> Maximus & his ealdormon hæfdon up ahæfen mid monigum þeodum.
Æfter þæm feng eft Ualentinianus to his rice.

& þæs ymb II ger, þa he on Gallie com, hiene ofsmorode Ambogestes his ealdormon, & hiene siþþan mid rapum be þæm sweoran up aheng, gelicost þæm þe he hiene self unwitende hæfde awierged; & gesette Eugenius to þæm rices noman, þæt he casere wære, & feng him self to þæm onwalde, for þon þe he ne mehte self habban þæs onwaldes noman, for þy he <næs> Romanisc; ac lærde þone oþerne þæt he diofolgield georne beeode.
Þa gelædde Theodosius eft fird wið him twæm to þære ilcan clusan þe he ær hæfde wið Maximus.
Þa sende Theodosius Gotene fultum beforan him, þæt hie þa clusan tobræcon; ac hie wurdon utan ymbfaren of þæm muntum, & ealle ofslagen: þæt wæron X M.
Þa for Theodosius þiderweard, & wiste þæt hiene mon wolde mid þæm ilcan wrence beþridian.

Þa hie togædereweard foran, þa þohton Eugenius & Arbogestes þæt hie sceoldon ærest of þæm muntum hie gebigan mid hiora flana gescotum, ac him onsende God swelcne wind ongean þæt hie ne mehton from him nænne flan asceotan, ac ælc com oþer þara, oþþe on hie selfe, oþþe on þa eorþan.
& Theodosius hæfde þone wind mid him þæt his fultum mehte mæstra ælcne heora flana on hiora feondum afæstnian.
Þær wearð Eugenius ofslagen, & Arbogastes ofstang hiene selfne.
Æfter þæm Theodosius for on Italie.
Þa he com to Mægelan þære byrig, þa geendade he his lif, & betahte his twæm sunum þone onwald.
<Æfter> þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & C & XLIX, feng Archadius to anwalde, to þæm eastdæle, & hine hæfde XII ger; & Onorius to þæm westdæle, & nugiet hæfð, cwæð Orosius.
& for þæm þe hie geonge wæron, he hie betahte his twæm ealdormonnum to bewitanne: Archadius wæs betaht Rufinuse, & Onorius wæs betaht Stilecan.

Ac hie gecyðdon raðe þæs hwelce hlafordhyldo hi þohton to gecyþanne on hiora ealdhlafordes bearnum, gif hi hit þurhteon mehten: Rufinus wolde habban him self þone anwold þær east, & Stileca wolde sellan his suna þisne her west.

& for þæm feondscipe he forlet Gotan on Italie mid hiora twam ciningum, Alrican & Rædgotan, & þohte, siþþan þæt folc oferfunden wære, þæt hie siþþan wolde eall þæt he <wolde>; & wende eac þæt he þæm Gotan þæs gewinnes mehte raðe gestieran, for þon he of hiora lande geboren wæs.
Raðe þæs Alrica wearð cristen; & Rædgota hæþen <þurhwunade>, & dæghwamlice wæs blotende diofolgildum mid monslihtum, & simle him wæs leofast þæt þa wæron Romanisce.

Nugiet eow Romane mæg gescomian, cwæð Orosius, þæt ge swa heanlic geþoht sceoldon on eow geniman for anes monnes ege & for anes monnes geblote, þæt ge sædon þæt þa hæðnan tida wæron beteran þonne þa cristnan, & eac þæt eow selfum wære betere þæt ge <eowerne> cristendom forleten, & to þæm hæðeniscan þeawum fenge, þe eowre ieldran ær beeodon.
Ge magon eac geþencan hu hean he eft wearþ his geblota & his diofolgilda þe he on gelifde, þa þa ge hiene gebundenne hæfdon, & hiene siþþan atugon swa swa ge woldon, & ealne his fultum.
Þæt wæs, swa swa ge selfe sædon, II C M, swa eower nan ne wearð gewundod.
Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra & C & IIII & siextegum, God gedyde his miltsunge on Romanum, þa þa he hiora misdæda wrecan let, þæt hit þeh dyde Alrica se cristena cyning & se mildesta.
& he mid swa lytle niþe abræc Romeburg, þæt he bebead þæt mon nænne mon ne sloge, & eac þæt man nanuht ne wanade ne ne yfelade þæs þe on þæm ciricum wære.
& sona þæs on þæm þriddan dæge hie aforan ut of þære byrig hiora agnum willan, swa þær ne wearð nan hus hiora willum forbærned.
Þær genom Hettulf, Alrican mæg, Onorius swostor þæs cyninges, & siþþan wið hine geþingade, & hi him to wife nam.
Siþþan sæton þa Gotan þær on lande, sume be þæs caseres willan, sume his unwillan; sume hi foron on Ispanie, & þær gesæton, sume on Affrice.
